ModMetaData.name: Filter by Headless (1.3-1.6)
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001, keitetsu
ModMetaData.description:
For those who like skullspikes, but don't like micromanaging burning bodies.
This mod allows you to filter corpses by those that have had their head removed, allowing automation at the crematorium again.
Originally created by papercrane1001 and updated for newer versions by keitetsu (GitHub: stotzem).
Source: https://github.com/stotzem/rimworld.filter_by_headless
License: MIT - feel free to use, modify, and share with credit.
